mapper.select: select tfcode from z_asset_syscourse where assetid = #{resId} and flag = 0 limit 1

SELECT s.sharescope from z_asset a LEFT JOIN z_asset_syscourse s on s.assetid = a.id WHERE a.userid = #{userId} and a.AssetPath = #{assetPath} OR a.AssetPath = REPLACE(#{assetPath},'\\','/') ORDER BY s.id limit 1
mapper.update: update z_asset_syscourse set tfcode=#{tfcode},sharescope=#{scope} where id = (SELECT id from ( SELECT MIN(id) as id from z_asset_syscourse where assetid =#{resId} and flag =false )ttttt)
